name: Temple Splash
description:
Temple Splash is a 2 player local game. In this top-down shooter, you must get rid of the Blops invading your temple and throw them in your opponent's temple!

We created this game during a 4 days Game Jam. It was a great success and won several prize during the ceremony:

  • Grand Prize
  • Polish Prize

You must use Xbox Controllers to play it.

Game Design: Florian Piette

Art: Dylan Eurlings, Thomas Goubier and Benoit Richard

Programming: Laurent Debien and Ilyes Ouhabi

Music: Elissa Mleiel
